subject: Football
Tests (Drug Use)
Human Growth Hormone
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Expectations are dimming that a testing program for H.G.H. can be in place by the start of the season as the union asks for more information from World Anti-Doping Agency.
snippet: Expectations are dimming that a testing program for H.G.H. can be in place by the start of the season as the union asks for more information from World Anti-Doping Agency.
